channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: No lights on bridge over station, 11th November
item.description:
Since the new bridge at the train station had been built there are no lights on around it at all. It is very dark going up the steps and especially in top. It is impossible to see if anyone else is on the bridge and I several times bumped into other people coming towards me. I also have a deaf friend who has been scared several times whilst crossing
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Whitehall Lane, North End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter and rubbish, 11th November
item.description:
It was updated as resolved but it’s not. It’s a consistent issue and there’s certain rubbish on that road that hasn’t moved in months. It not pleasant and nice .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thanet Road, North End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Smelly road gully, 11th November
item.description:
The gully on the road outside 35 Bristol Gardens has had an extreme sewage smell on and off 3 times in the last 7 days. The smell is so extreme that it affects the nearby properties when the odour comes out. Come and clean it!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Bristol Gardens, Maida Vale, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dear sir/madam Could you please ask aerial manager & Trowbridge resident association chair member for an update on Osborne Road barrier gate being fixed. Trowbridge resident association chair member advertising no updates, information for a number of years on Trowbridge resident association group websites which this information is outdated and incorrect.Could chair member please give current ETA, update to Osborne Road E9 5JR barrier gate is going to be fixed.Antisocial behaviour at Osborne Road garages,legal parking, no parking enforcement, unauthorized vehicle or hours.Residents with any problems please make contact with your chair member Trowbridge resident association group. To discuss any issues on the estate & antisocial behaviour,crime. You can make contact with your Trowbridge resident association group chair member via website link. Please feel free to contact us with any issues around the estate. Trowbridge Residents Association | Homeowners Association Business https://share.google/V0EetNBq8U8GhGdxR Email: eugene.egan70@gmail.com Phone: 07944759507, 10th November
item.description:
Dear sir/madam Could you please ask aerial manager & Trowbridge resident association chair member for an update on Osborne Road barrier gate being fixed. Trowbridge resident association chair member advertising no updates, information for a number of yea

item.title: PUBLIC DANGER - Huge quantities of fallen leaves unswept., 10th November
item.description:
It’s autumn, we get it, leaves fall. But with the quantity of dropped leaves and the infrequent sweeping - it has really become a hazard. It is impossible to see the edge of the curb/pavement which is a tripping risk. And the leaves are, of course, slippery when wet. Why don’t you leave sacks with residents to sweep and bag the fallen leaves, which you then pick up? My brown bin is completely full as is that of neighbouring properties. So give residents some bags and we will supplement the council services which are no longer provided.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 84, East Dulwich Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road sunk, 10th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 56, Roseacre Road, Welling, London
